alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 8:39PM CST until February 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain or occasional freezing drizzle. Total ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths of an inch, especially on elevated surfaces. Wind gusts as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Illinois and east central Iowa. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible, especially on bridges, overpasses, and untreated pavement.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
